message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANT_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Participant cannot be added as they are already on the Appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_DATE_LATER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: The Date Received must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_RECEIVED_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_START_DATE
message.locale: The Date Received must not be earlier than the Start Date of the Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_DECISION_EXISTS_APPELLANT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_TO_APPEAL_CASE
message.locale: A decision exists for the Appeal case. The Appellant cannot be added to the Appeal Case.

message.name: INF_INSUFFICIENT_TIME_CORRESPONDENCE_RELATED_TO_HEARING
message.locale: There is insufficient time to send correspondence related to this hearing.

message.name: ERR_LAST_APPELLANT_ON_APPEAL_CASE_PARTICIPANT_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: The Participant is the last Appellant on the Appeal case. The Participant cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_EXISTS_FOR_APPELLANTS_CASE_APPELLANT_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: A decision exists for the Appellant's case. The Appellant cannot be removed from the Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_EXISTS_FOR_APPEAL_CASE_APPELLANT_DETAILS_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: A decision exists for the Appeal case. The Appellant details cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_CASE_CLOSED_APPELLANT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED
message.locale: The appeal case is closed. The appellant cannot be added to the Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_CASE_CLOSED_APPELLANT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The appeal case is closed. The appellant details cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_CASE_CLOSED_APPELLANT_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: The appeal case is closed. The appellant cannot be removed from the Appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_CASE_CANCELLED_APPELLANT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED
message.locale: The appeal case is canceled. The appellant cannot be added to the Appeal Case.
The appeal case is cancelled. The appellant cannot be added to the Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_CASE_CANCELLED_APPELLANT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The appeal case is canceled. The appellant details cannot be modified.
The appeal case is cancelled. The appellant details cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_CASE_CANCELLED_APPELLANT_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: The appeal case is canceled. The appellant cannot be removed from the Appeal case.
The appeal case is cancelled. The appellant cannot be removed from the Appeal case.
